name: DERELICT (itch) (Blue Hat Studios)
description:
DERELICT

An AI exploring the wreck of an alien craft uncovers the terrible fate of its crew – and an entire civilization.
Made for the Write-A-Game Jam of June 2015.

NOTE: This game will not play in Google Chrome. Try Firefox or something else.

04/15/17 - just published a downloadable build. There's still some kinks to work out since this was originally designed for Unity's WebPlayer, but for now it works and runs well on 1680 x 1050. I'll get full 1080 working eventually but just not today. Enjoy!
